title: How to paint like a professional: a complete guide to interior painting.
brief_description: A practical guide to handy tips and techniques to achieve a professional interior painting job in your home. Terms like acrylic, enamel, pigment and sealer are clearly explained. Advice is given on the choice of paint, roller and brush, surface preparation, patching cracks, protecting floors and furniture, paint application, cleaning up after the job and storage of excess paint.
